TopicTitle: Should I rebuild my inflatable space station replicas for 1.0?

Articles.Content:
I made a bunch of awesome Bigelow Aerospace stations in .90 but they took forever and I'm not sure if I want to redo them because of part count issues in 1.0, should I?

**Lunar Outpost**

![2CEA5B7CB930F69849D8AC6ECB69793874F5ED6E](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/32995681682259702/2CEA5B7CB930F69849D8AC6ECB69793874F5ED6E/)

**Nautilus**

![120304CB1597CBA5BF53F197A5FD6622FC5AAB6E](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/32995681682286288/120304CB1597CBA5BF53F197A5FD6622FC5AAB6E/)

**Alpha**

![2E85DC85A5CA7932595371EC477659CFF75F894B](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/32995681682290560/2E85DC85A5CA7932595371EC477659CFF75F894B/)

I say you should go for it. Squad is porting KSP to unity 5 soon anyway, which should make lots of parts on a craft less of a problem. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
